publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3458# Margaret Smith: Draft West Edinburgh Planning Framework—That the Parliament welcomes the recent publication of the draft West Edinburgh Planning Framework and recognises west Edinburgh’s significant contribution to Scotland’s economy, transport and environment.

S1M-3458# Margaret Smith: Draft West Edinburgh Planning Framework—That the Parliament welcomes the recent publication of the draft West Edinburgh Planning Framework and recognises west Edinburgh’s significant contribution to Scotland’s economy, transport and environment.
S1M-3458# Draft West Edinburgh Planning Framework (lodged on 3 October 2002) Donald Gorrie*
